enum_values.name: ping
enum_values.description: Sent every time when the webhook is configured or changed.

enum_values.name: trip_started
enum_values.description: Sent every time a vehicle starts a trip.

enum_values.name: trip_ended
enum_values.description: Sent when a vehicle ends a trip.

enum_values.name: vehicle_location_changed
enum_values.description: Sent when the vehicle location changes.

enum_values.name: authorization_changed
enum_values.description: Sent when the authorization status changes.

enum_values.name: tire_pressure_changed
enum_values.description: Sent when the tire pressure changed to low or too high.

enum_values.name: seat_belt_triggered
enum_values.description: Indicates a seat belt is buckled while the vehicle is moving.

enum_values.name: maintenance_changed
enum_values.description: Triggered when the property "condition_based_services" in Maintenance capability changes.

enum_values.name: dashboard_lights_changed
enum_values.description: Triggered when the warning/malfunction indicator lights change.

enum_values.name: ignition_changed
enum_values.description: Triggered when the ignition state changes, e.g. at the beginning and the end of a trip.

enum_values.name: accident_reported
enum_values.description: Triggered when accident assistance call is triggered, either manually by the driver or automatically by the vehicle.

enum_values.name: emergency_reported
enum_values.description: Triggered when intelligent emergency call is triggered.

enum_values.name: breakdown_reported
enum_values.description: Triggered when the driver calls the roadside assistance service.

enum_values.name: battery_guard_warning
enum_values.description: Triggered when the 12V battery runs low

enum_values.name: engine_changed
enum_values.description: Triggered when the engine state changes.

enum_values.name: fleet_clearance_changed
enum_values.description: Triggered when the vehicle fleet clearance has changed.
